site_name: Booker Cash & Carry, 37 Greenwich High Road, Greenwich, London, SE10 8LR
description: An application submitted under Section 73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a minor material amendment in connection with the planning permission 16/1792/F, dated 07/03/2017 for the redevelopment of the site to provide 125 residential units, 513 sqm of commercial floor space (use classes A1, A2, A3, B1 or D1), ranging from 4 to 14-storeys and a stand-alone commercial unit; 24 car parking spaces (including car club and accessible provision), private and communal landscaped amenity areas, secure cycle parking and other associated development. to allow:The increase in range of approved uses within the commercial space fronting Greenwich High Road to include D1 (currently A1, A2, A3 and B1); andCorrections to the approved ground floor plan to show the approved D1 Use in the other commercial space, and remove the D2 Use which was listed in error.
